scripts.unlink: cd resources; if [ -h bin ]; then unlink bin; fi; cd ../
scripts.build: rm -fr dist && mkdir dist && tar cf dist/node_modules.tar node_modules && cp -rv ./resources/bin ./dist/ && cp -rv ./lib ./dist/ && cp -vr ./dapps ./dist/ && cp -rv ./resources/dist/nativeApp ./dist/
scripts.release: npm run unlink && ln -s bin_linux64 ./resources/bin && npm run buildNativeApp && npm run build && npm run package
scripts.releaseMac64: npm run unlink && ln -s bin_darwin64 ./resources/bin && npm run buildNativeApp && npm run build && npm run packageMac64
scripts.appInstall: tar xf ./OptractClient.tar.gz -C ../OptractClient && cd ../OptractClient/dist && ln -s ../ipfs_repo && cd dapps && ln -s ../../myArchive.bcup && ln -s ../../keystore
scripts.appUninstall: cd ../OptractClient/dist && unlink ./ipfs_repo && cd dapps && unlink ./myArchive.bcup && unlink ./keystore && cd ../.. && rm -fr ./dist
